Section.Catchline: Transactions by electronic or telephonic means.

Subsection.Text: The department may accept any application provided for under this chapter by electronic or telephonic means.
The department may issue an electronic certificate of title in lieu of printing a paper title.

The department may collect electronic mail addresses and use electronic mail in lieu of the United States Postal Service as a method of notification. However, any notice regarding the potential forfeiture or foreclosure of an interest in property must be sent via the United States Postal Service.
